subject: RE: [junit] Juint a servlet...
msgSnippet: try using cactus.  Look at http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus/index.html  . ... From: Andoni O Conchubhair
messageBody:
Juint a servlet...
try using cactus.  Look at http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus/index.html.
-----Original Message-----
From: Andoni O'Conchubhair [mailto:andoni.oconchubhair@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 12, 2001 10:46 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Juint a servlet...

Can anybody give me ideas as to what kind of tests I should apply to a servlet.  Basically I am serving three .jsp pages and making a connection to the database on the other side.

Do most of Junit's users use it from something like 'together'?  or do you write your tests by hand?

Andoni.
